##  Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows project style and conventions  
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets  
- [ ] Terraform validated (`terraform validate`)  
- [ ] Formatting correct (`terraform fmt`)  

### Security
- [ ] No plaintext credentials committed  
- [ ] IAM/OIDC permissions unchanged or reviewed  
- [ ] SSM Parameter Store used where applicable  

### CI/CD
- [ ] Workflows succeed locally or via dry-run  
- [ ] Actions pinned to full SHA  
- [ ] No excessive logging
